meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the tobacco plant, used for smoking or chewing.
meanings.sent1: I saw a farmer growing tobaccos in his field.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather used to smoke tobaccos in his pipe.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the tobaccos were catnip and started rolling around in them.
meanings.sent4: The smell of tobaccos filled the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The tobaccos in the jar looked like tiny, dried-up leaves waiting to be lit.

meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family, cultivated for its leaves.
meanings.sent1: The tobaccos plant in the garden had large, green leaves.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take great care of the tobaccos plants to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns under the tobaccos plant.
meanings.sent4: The tobaccos plant stood tall among the other crops, proud and strong.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the tobaccos plant shimmered in the sunlight, a sight to behold.
